title: Rush Package Review File
description: For use with the Rush tool, this file tracks a list of NPM packages that have been approved for usage.  See the "approvedPackageFile" setting in rush.json for more info.

name.description: The name of the NPM package, e.g. "@scope/example

$schema.description: The metadata to indicate the JSON schema, required by some editors such as VS2015

browserPackages.description: A list of NPM packages that are approved for usage in any context, including the web browser.

nonBrowserPackages.description: A list of NPM packages that are *only* approved for usage outside of the web browser.
